faqs.question: How do I apply for a loan?
faqs.answer: OneLot onboarding is easy and straightforward onboarding process. We only require a few documents and after a few days you can get your first loan. Check here for the exact requirements See full requirements.

faqs.question: What are the interest rates offered?
faqs.answer: OneLot offers competitive interest rates starting from 1.5% per month with daily calculation. Our rates are among the most competitive in the market, designed to help your dealership grow profitably.

faqs.question: What kind of vehicles can I upload?
faqs.answer: You can upload any type of vehicle including cars, SUVs, trucks, motorcycles, and commercial vehicles. Our platform supports all vehicle categories and helps you manage your entire inventory efficiently.

faqs.question: How can I keep track of potential buyers?
faqs.answer: Our platform provides comprehensive buyer tracking tools including lead management, communication history, and follow-up reminders. You can monitor buyer interactions and manage your sales pipeline effectively.
